channel.title: Objects not appearing?
channel.description:
im using RichScape V2, when i go into the globaldrops and objects cfg files, and add things in they dont appear?
EG [code]object = 2470 2123 4910 1 (they are spaced proporly)[/code]
THis is supposed to be in the secret draynor, but it dosnt appear (i have compiled it)
Another thing, on the mopar.org client, some portals appear in a portal room, which dont appear in the richscape v4 client? but sometimes they do??

item.title: Objects not appearing?
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

I dont know if Richscape is any different from other servers seeing as ive never worked with itâ€¦ but if your meaning to add global objects into your server I believe you would use Client.java? I know I used my Client.java to add in global objects. All you have to do is go into your Client.java and hit Ctrl + F and search for MakeGlobalObject. If I misunderstood you sorry that I couldnt help.

Read full topic
